Description: Automatic boundary correctly aligned with manual structure
Boundary placed without any musical or structural justification
Notes: Boundaries fall inside stable sections without harmonic, textural, or functional change.

Description: Boundary triggered by silence or reverb tail instead of real transition
Notes: Split caused by decay zone, not marking a new structural section.

Description: Model failed to detect real structural transition
Notes: All main section transitions (Theme A, Build/Theme B, Outro) were not captured.

Description: Automatic model produced excessive number of boundaries
Notes: Model applies near-regular slicing across the track instead of structure-aware segmentation.
